article.title: Connecting Sync Gateway to Couchbase Server

introduction.paragraph: You can connect Sync Gateway to Couchbase Server 2.0 or later.
To connect Sync Gateway to Couchbase Server:

ordered-list.list-item: Open the Couchbase Server Admin Console and log on using your administrator credentials.
In the toolbar, click Data Buckets.
On the Data Buckets page, click Create New Data Bucket and create a bucket named sync_gateway in the default pool.

introduction.paragraph: You can use any name you want for your bucket, but sync_gateway is the default name that Sync Gateway uses if you do not specify a bucket name when you start Sync Gateway. If you use a different name for your bucket, you need to specify the -bucket option when you start Sync Gateway.
